title: Pieces of Venus may be hiding on the moon
content: The solar system is a messy place.

title: What It's Like to Become a NASA Astronaut: 10 Surprising Facts
China selects 18 new astronauts in preparation for space station launch
content: China has selected a third group of astronauts for the nation's coming space station, the China Manned Space Agency announced on Oct. 1.
